text: Iti: “Imi vanhu! Iyezvino chokwadi (Qur’aan namutumwa Muhammad (SAW)) chauya kwamuri kubva kuna Tenzi venyu. Nokudaro ani nani anogamuchira gwara, anodaro kuzvinatsurudza iye pachake; uye ani nani anorasika, anodaro mukurasikirwa kwake ega; uye handisi kwamuri muchengetedzi (anokumanikidzirai kutevera gwara).”
